reviews.text: Bottle Cape Town. Pours autumn brown leaves clear with some red and light head and medium carbonation. Aroma is malty, sweet, caramel toffee. Taste is sweet. Overall enjoyable.
Tasted this last year and the new offering is way better a truly balanced and pleasant drinking experience. Can smash multiple of these!
A light hazy amber colour with a small off-white head. An aroma of lemon, grapefriut and black currant. The taste is medium sweet and medium bitter.
